features: ENGAGING TODDLER ACTIVITIES: This busy board features colorful pages with multiple activities, including matching velcro shapes, practicing zippers, snaps, and buttons, learning time and letters, and cosmic-themed learning, etc. Your child will have fun while developing their hands-on ability and gaining confidence.

RECOMMENDED FOR AGES 1 TO 5: Designed by professional early education teachers, it is an excellent Montessori toddler toys for homeschooling use or in the preschool classroom. The rich page details contain knowledge and content that children need to know the most. Allowing kids to develop life skills, focusing attention, thinking exploration and enlightenment education, etc.

SAFE AND DURABLE: Made of soft felted wool and ABS material, our sensory toy is 100% safe for kids and adults. All pieces on the busy board are reinforced and won't fall off, making it a reliable and durable toy for your child to enjoy.

TRAVEL TOYS: Our learning busy board is lightweight and portable, making it perfect for playing on the go. It weighs only 0.34 pounds and comes with a handbag design, so your child can easily hold it or put it in a school bag. It's perfect for playing on planes, cars, parks, and outdoor activities.

COST-EFFECTIVE LEARNING TOY: Our sensory busy board is a practical and educational toy that will entertain your child while reducing their screen time. It's perfect for learning fine motor skills in play and makes for the perfect educational gift for toddlers.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: EVEViSiON Busy Board Montessori Toy - Educational Fun for Early Learners A great sensory toy and preschool learning activity for toddlers. Every component on the montessori busy book is well-made and sturdy. Develop kids' basic life skills, enrich imagination, logical thinking, practical ability, hand-eye coordination, focusing mind, color perception. 28 activities: Zippers, shoelaces, buttons, buckles, alphabets, jigsaw puzzles, clock & number & month & week & AM or PM, season & weather etc.
It's designed like a bag, portable and lightweight. Folding doesn't deform or leave a mark. The color will not fade when washing, safe material.
Basic Life Skills Learning Tie Shoes Fasten Clothes Buckles Pull Hat Clasp Zipper up Clothes

reviews.reviewText: We got it and the velcro pieces haven’t stayed on but the customer service was absolutely fabulous about everything. They’re super understanding and very communicative. I really really love the idea of this for little kids and my toddler enjoys it in the car. Even if it’s just touching stuff yet

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fun, but pieces aren't secure
reviews.reviewText: This busy book activities are fine, but the technical aspects of the way it's made leave a little to be desired. Some of the velcro needs to be attached before this can be used and you're just pressing it on. The adhesive on the velcro just isn't as strong as it should be. The button holes are a little tight. Despite that, the activities are really fun.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Educational Fun Packed in a Compact Package!
reviews.reviewText: I got this Montessori Busy Board for my nephew, inspired by the success of a similar one I got for my niece, who played with this board often.What stands out about this busy board is the thoughtful inclusion of challenges that not only captivate a toddler's attention but also contribute to skill development and sensory/motor skills. The various buckles and knots provide just the right level of challenge, encouraging the little ones to explore and enhance their fine motor abilities. Some is harder to do than others, obviously.A standout feature that my previous board lacked was the counting kit, allowing children to learn and practice counting using their hands and fingers. It's a brilliant addition that adds an educational element to the play, making it a win-win for both fun and learning. Although this board did include addition stick-ons (velcro) such as fruits, decorations, alphabets and numbers like the one I had, I like it just as is because it's easy to maintain and clean up without the adons, which the little ones end up losing and throwing all over the place.One of the best aspects of this busy board is its affordability. Priced competitively (compared to many other brands I searched), it offers exceptional value, especially considering the high quality and educational features it provides. The compact design is a game-changer. Everything neatly folds into a small folder, making it incredibly light and easy to store or put away when not in use. It's the perfect solution for keeping the play area tidy and organized.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This was great for keeping my 2 year old busy. Would have preferred better quality but definitely did the job.
